thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 63 of 625
thread.title: Noel

author: Noel
title: Noel
text: The clothes are wonderful and the store we visited was clean and had friendly employees. The website was easy to navigate, but the checkout process on the mobile site was difficult as it did not give the option to checkout without the VisaCheckout program. The tall sizes are also very helpful. It was sad that more of the leggings did not come in tall or were sold out. These were the only roadblock that we encountered, and we are expecting to order more items in the future.
